snippet.title: Thunder Tier One - Official TGA 2020 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Join the free gameplay preview from Dec.11 to Dec.13 exclusively on Steam: 
http://bit.ly/ThunderTierOneSteam

Plan, position and execute. Join the elite, bring the thunder. ⚡

Thunder Tier One is a top-down tactical shooter that lets you play as a tier one operator across various scenarios. Set in the early nineties, players must combine leadership and tactical skills, and use military equipment to create an efficient war machine.

#ThunderTierOne #TheGameAwards
